testcase.title: rhsm.gui.tests.system_tests.error_dialog_and_no_traceback_when_network_is_down
testcase.description: Given a system is registered and at least one subscription is attached and I have run 'subscription-manager-gui' When the network goes down and I try to remove some subscription in 'My Subscriptions' tab Then I should see a dialog 'Network is down' and no traceback appears in '/var/log/rhsm/rhsm.log'
